hero.headline: Burooj: Design. Manage. Clean. Elevated.
hero.subheadline: Integrated construction, property management, and drone-powered cleaning built for today's modern developments.

about.title: About Burooj
about.description: Burooj is a multi-disciplinary Saudi company offering comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning. With a commitment to quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings and properties throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to operation and maintenance.

hero.headline: Shaping Smarter Buildings and Stronger Communities.
hero.subheadline: Burooj delivers integrated engineering, property management, and drone-powered cleaning solutions—combining innovation, precision, and decades of multidisciplinary expertise to elevate every project we touch.

section.title: Who We Are
section.description: Burooj is a multi-disciplinary Saudi company offering comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning. With a commitment to quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings and properties throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to operation and maintenance.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the region's most trusted provider of integrated property, engineering, and cleaning solutions through innovation, quality, and reliability.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To deliver modern, high-quality, and technology-driven services that support clients throughout the entire lifecycle of their properties.

team.title: A Multidisciplinary Team Leading, Designing, and Executing Every Project
team.subtitle: Expert professionals dedicated to excellence
team.description: A Multidisciplinary Team Leading, Designing, and Executing Every Project

bts.title: Behind The Scenes
bts.subtitle: How We Work
bts.description: From initial concept to final delivery, see how our team brings projects to life with precision, innovation, and dedication.

clients.title: Our trusted partners, from bold startups to global icons

stat1.title: Projects Delivered
stat1.description: Covering residential villas, commercial fit-outs, smart systems, and high-rise drone cleaning.

stat2.title: Managed Units & Assets
stat2.description: Providing structured, data-driven property management with reporting automation.

stat3.title: Cleaned by Drones
stat3.description: Fast, safe, and eco-efficient façade and solar panel cleaning across the Kingdom.

drone.title: Drone Cleaning Services
drone.description: Burooj Air is the first drone-cleaning provider in Saudi Arabia and the GCC, offering fast, safe, and eco-friendly cleaning for high-rise buildings, solar panels, industrial structures, and high-access assets.

highlight.title: Reinventing Cleaning Through Drone Technology
highlight.description: Burooj Air introduces a safer, faster, and more efficient approach to cleaning across the Kingdom—removing the need for scaffolding, reducing risks, and delivering consistent results.

clients.title: Trusted by Leading Developers and Corporates
clients.description: Trusted by leading companies, developers, investors, and organizations across Saudi Arabia.

footer.description: Integrated construction, property management, and drone cleaning solutions powered by technology and Saudi expertise.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Burooj ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We may collect information that you provide directly to us, including but not limited to:
items: Any other information you choose to provide

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Respond to your inquiries and requests

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

agreementToTerms.title: Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on Burooj's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on Burooj's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Burooj makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall Burooj or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Burooj's website.

revisions.title: Revisions
revisions.content: Burooj may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with us for consultations, proposals, or any inquiries.
contact.descriptionFull: Reach out for consultations, proposals, or to learn more about our comprehensive solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone cleaning.

hero.headline: Integrated Solutions for Smarter, Stronger, and Cleaner Spaces.
hero.subheadline: Burooj unifies engineering, property management, and drone-powered cleaning into one seamless experience—delivering efficiency, precision, and long-lasting value across every project.

about.title: A
about.description:
Burooj delivers integrated solutions across engineering, construction, property management, and drone-powered cleaning. With a focus on quality, speed, and technology-driven efficiency, we support buildings throughout their entire lifecycle—from design and development to daily operations and long-term maintenance.

Our unified approach allows clients to rely on one trusted partner for everything their property needs—architecture, fit-outs, smart systems, asset management, and advanced cleaning solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Engineering, property management, and drone-powered cleaning—designed to support every stage of a building's lifecycle with clarity, precision, and modern efficiency.

construction.title: CONSTRUCTION
construction.description: Architecture, interiors, MEP, and smart systems that keep developments future-ready. Every solution is documented with detailed drawings and 3D visuals for clients and partners.

property.title: PROPERTY
property.description: 360° operations that combine leasing, compliance, finance, and tenant services. We deliver transparent reporting and reliable execution at every stage.

drone.title: DRONE
drone.description: The region's first drone cleaning program, covering facades, solar farms, industrial infrastructure, and other high-access assets with zero scaffolding required.

page.title: Services
page.headline: Integrated services from design to operations
page.description: Burooj unifies construction, property management, and drone cleaning through a single team, ensuring consistent standards and faster delivery.
